entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 3:19 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 7.8°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
